snippet.title: Amber Heard shared a ridiculously racist tweet about Housekeepers
snippet.description:
Amber Heard: BLASTED for Racist Tweet About Housekeepers The actress found herself at the center of a controversy related to this pair of problems on Tuesday, after a tweet she wrote in response to the Immigration and Customs Enforcement Agency (ICE) by establishing a path nearby. of your house.

This is what the 32-year-old star wrote shortly after midnight today:

"I just heard that there is an ICE checkpoint in Hollywood, a few blocks from where I live, all better to give their housewives, nannies and landscapers a ride home tonight," said Tweeted Heard.

Her point here, of course, was that many housekeepers, babysitters, and landscapers are undocumented immigrants and that ICE can stop them and deport them.

She's wrong? Probably not, as a kind of extreme generalization.

But we can see why the Tweet caused an uproar, right?

"I can see where you were going but at some point along the way you took a wrong turn, eliminate this sister," wrote one of the social media.

Heard eliminated the publication, but did not apologize for it.

Instead, she simply made the same point in a different way.

"With this crisis of human rights so politicized, it is difficult to make a simple statement without it being used to distract from real problems," he explained, adding:

"It's hard for everyone not to be negatively affected by this issue in any way."
tags: rudy mancuso mama official music video
